eligibility.notes: 7-11 COD; opened ~12h after pickup; Order is not yet completed

snadResult.label: Neutral
snadResult.reason: The buyer's complaint about the cracked cup does not qualify as SNAD since the seller provided pre-shipment photos showing the cup was intact, indicating the damage likely occurred during delivery.

primaryOption.label: Partial Refund & Keep Item
primaryOption.details: Buyer keeps the item; offer 15–30% partial refund.

caseSummary:
Order: TW-13058
Eligibility: R1/R2/R3 ✅
Key: The buyer's complaint about the cracked cup does not qualify as SNAD since the seller provided pre-shipment photos showing the cup was intact, indicating the damage likely occurred during delivery.
Decision: Neutral
Outcome: The buyer initiated a return request, and the seller agreed to provide a full refund after the system notification was triggered.
